Package jdr.generator.api.characters

Class OpenaiService

java.lang.Object
jdr.generator.api.characters.OpenaiService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeminiGenerationConfiguration
@Service("openaiService") public class OpenaiService extends Object implements GeminiGenerationConfiguration
Service for interacting with the OpenAI API for character generation and statistics.

    • cleanJsonString

      private String cleanJsonString(String jsonString)
      Validates if a given JSON string is well-formed.
      Parameters:
      jsonString - The JSON string to validate.
      Returns:
      The original JSON string if valid, or "{}" if invalid.

    • generateIllustrationAsync

      @Async protected CompletableFuture<Void> generateIllustrationAsync(IllustrationDrawStyle promptDrawStyle, CharacterDetailsEntity entity)
      Asynchronously generates an illustration for a character using the OpenAI API.
      Parameters:
      promptDrawStyle - The key and prompt defining the overall portrait style to generate
      entity - The details of the character for whom to generate the illustration.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture representing the completion of the asynchronous operation.

    • generate

      public CharacterDetailsModel generate(DefaultContextJson data)
      Generates character details based on the provided context using the OpenAI API.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface GeminiGenerationConfiguration
      Parameters:
      data - The context data for character generation.
      Returns:
      The generated CharacterDetailsModel.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error communicating with the OpenAI API or processing the response.

    • illustrate

      public byte[] illustrate(String promptPortrait)
      Generates an image based on the provided prompt using the OpenAI API.
      Specified by:
      illustrate in interface GeminiGenerationConfiguration
      Parameters:
      promptPortrait - The prompt for the image generation.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the generated image, or null if an error occurs.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error communicating with the OpenAI API.

    • regenerateIllustration

      public byte[] regenerateIllustration(Long id, String newDrawStyle)
      Regenerates an illustration for an existing character based on its stored details.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character for which to regenerate the illustration.
      newDrawStyle - An optional new drawing style to use for the illustration. If null or empty,
      Returns:
      An array of bytes representing the regenerated image.

    • stats

      public String stats(Long characterDetailsId)
      Retrieves character statistics from the OpenAI API for a given character ID.
      Specified by:
      stats in interface GeminiGenerationConfiguration
      Parameters:
      characterDetailsId - The ID of the character details.
      Returns:
      A JSON string containing the character's statistics.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error communicating with the OpenAI API or if character details or context are not found.

    • saveCharacterJsonData

      private void saveCharacterJsonData(CharacterDetailsEntity detailsEntity, String jsonData)
      Saves the character's JSON data to the database.
      Parameters:
      detailsEntity - The ID of the character details.
      jsonData - The JSON data to be saved.
